short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the Title and URL in Markdown format or HTML Anchor format or only Title by page context menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the page title and URL in Markdown format or only Title or or HTML Anchor Tag format by using right-click in the browser page. 1. Markdown Format - select `Copy Title,URL` > `Markdown: [Title](URL)` 2. only Title - select `Copy Title,URL` > `Title only` 3. HTML Anchor Format - select `Copy Title,URL` > `HTML: Title`
